greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that k divides Sum_{j=1..k} prime(j)^19.
link: OEIS Wiki, Sums of powers of primes divisibility sequences.
mathematica: s = 0; Do[s = s + Prime[n]^19; If[ Mod[s, n] == 0, Print[n]], {n, 50000}]
xref: Cf. A085450 (smallest m > 1 such that m divides Sum_{k=1..m} prime(k)^n).
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jun 25 2007
